items.name: Boxing Ring and Allied Accessories
items.specs: Playing Surface Size 24ft x 24ft corner, Size 20ft x 20ft from rope to rope, Laminated waterproof wooden planks 8x3x1 inch thick, Waterproof canvas cover, Height of ring 1 meter from ground level, Corner poles made of 4 inch pipe in white, blue & red colour with protection padding, Cross link tensioned wires, Four ropes 3.5 inches thick covered with synthetic cover, Additional accessories like funnel tube and three stairs basket, Iron pillars of shelter with 24 gauge PPGI sheet

full_text_summary: The bid document outlines a requirement for the procurement of boxing ring and allied accessories. Specifications include playing surface, waterproof wooden planks, height of ring from ground level, corner poles, rope features, and additional accessories like funnel tube and stairs. Iron pillars with PPGI sheet roofing are also required. Full details on tender processes, eligibility, experience requirements, financial conditions, and document submissions are not specified in the provided text.
